fields.field: Are you male or female?  Type F for female, and M for Male
fields.value: Luo Translation: In lacoo onyo dakoo? Coo D ka in dakoo. Coo L  ka in lacoo.

fields.field: Which village in the district will you be reporting from? Please respond ONLY with the name of your village.
fields.value: Waci wa kama in ibedo iyee?  Timiwa ber icoo nying ka in iyaa ici iyee.

fields.field: Congratulations!!!! You are now a registered member of U-report! With U-report you can make a real difference.  Your Voice Matters.  From UNICEF.
fields.value: Apwoyo indong itye ikin joo me u-report. Iromo kelo aloka loka.  Lok dogi pire tek

fields.field: Welcome to U-report where you can SPEAK UP and BE HEARD on what is happening in your community . it is FREE
fields.value: Apwoyo bino I U-report ka ma itwero LOK, ki bene ki roomo WINYI pi gin matye ka time i kabedo ma megi. Obedu ME MONONO

fields.field: U-report is a FREE SMS text message service that is sent to your phone.  U-report is sponsored by UNICEF and partners
fields.value: U-report obedo waraga ma ki cwalo i cim me cing kun bedo MI MONONO. U-report jo ma gu culu pire en atye UNICEF ki jo makene ma gitiyo kedegi

fields.field: Welcome to U-report! U-report is a community of Ugandan youth that are dedicated to working for positive change in their communities.  Stay tuned for more information.
fields.value: Obedo dul pa joo ma tino ma gimito loko ka bedo ma megi wek obedo maber.

fields.field: How did you hear about U REPORT?
fields.value: I winyo pi U-report ki kwene?

fields.field: Its important to know which District you'll be reporting on so we can work together to try & resolve issues in your community!Reply ONLY with your district.
fields.value: Bedo ber me ngeno ka ma ibibedo ka cwalo ngec man ki iiye weki wati karacel kun wateme me tyeko lok ma tye I kin gang ma magi. Dwong ki nying ka ma in iaa ki iyee KENE..

fields.field: U-report gives you a chance to speak out on issues in your community & share opinions with youth around Uganda! Best responses & results shared through the media!
fields.value: U-report mini kare me lok ikum jami matime i kama in ibedo iyee.  Lagam mabejo kibiketo ne I karatac me ngec.

fields.field: Best responses may be shared!Send us your name,or if you prefer a nickname so we can give u recognition for good replies by sharing them in the media!
fields.value: Lagam ma bejo ki biketo ne i karatac me ngec cwali wa nyingionyo nying pak mamegi.

fields.field: We didn't recognize your district.  Please carefully type the name of your district and re-send.
fields.value: Pr onayg district ki. Tim ber ico nying district ki aber ite cwalo
